movies.title: Avatar: Fire and Ash
movies.description: The third installment in the Avatar franchise follows Jake Sully and Neytiri as they confront new threats on Pandora in James Cameron's epic sci-fi saga.

movies.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants
movies.description: SpongeBob and friends embark on a heroic journey through Bikini Bottom and the underworld to save Gary and break a curse in this animated family adventure.

movies.title: The Housemaid
movies.description: A tense psychological thriller adaptation where a housemaid uncovers dark secrets in a wealthy family's home, starring Sydney Sweeney and Amanda Seyfried.

movies.title: David
movies.description: A shepherd faces divine challenges and follows a heavenly light in this faith-based Christmas drama celebrating the holiday season.

movies.title: AMC Screen Unseen: December 15
movies.description: AMC's mystery screening event where audiences discover the film only after purchase, a platform-style limited release.

movies.title: The Royal Ballet: The Nutcracker
movies.description: Live recording of the classic Royal Ballet production of The Nutcracker, a holiday tradition screened in select theaters nationwide.
